title: Find a Product for a Customer
description: A customer asks a store associate for help finding a specific product.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for the product name or description.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate understands what product the customer is looking for.

tasks.description: Use a handheld device to look up the product and find its location in the store.
tasks.expected_outcome: The device shows the product is in 'Aisle 7, Bay 3'.

tasks.description: Escort the customer to the correct location and help them find the product on the shelf.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer successfully finds the product they were looking for.
